t: For the choir director. A Psalm of David; for a memorial.
O*pn God, hasten*i to deliver me; O*ln Lord,*s hasten to my help!
Let*ln those be ashamed and humiliated Who*ln seek my life; Let*ln those be turned back and dishonored Who*ln delight in my hurt.
Let*ln those be turned back because of their shame Who*ln say, “Aha, aha!”
Let*ln all who seek You rejoice and be glad in You; And*ln let those who love Your salvation say continually, “Let*ln God be magnified.”
But*ln I am afflicted and needy; Hasten*ln to me, O God! You*ln are my help and my deliverer; O*ln Lord,*s do not delay.
